taskSpec.description: This is a dummy task that emulates a task that scans source code. Its sole purpose is to facilitate testing.

params.name: commit
params.description: The value to of the commit result.

params.name: url
params.description: The value of the url result.

params.name: committer-date
params.description: The value of the committer-date result.

taskSpec.description: This is a dummy task that emulates a task that performs a git clone. Its sole purpose is to facilitate testing.

steps.name: clone
steps.script:
#!/usr/bin/env sh
set -euo pipefail

echo -n "${COMMIT}" > "/tekton/results/commit"
echo -n "${URL}" > "/tekton/results/url"
echo -n "${COMMITTER_DATE}" > "/tekton/results/committer-date"

results.name: commit
results.description: The precise commit SHA that was fetched by this Task.

results.name: url
results.description: The precise URL that was fetched by this Task.

results.name: committer-date
results.description: The epoch timestamp of the commit that was fetched by this Task.
